title: Business context and outcome mapping
summary: Translate integration modernization into measurable business outcomes and platform outcomes.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Programs drift when goals are vague (e.g., “get off BizTalk”) and success is not measurable.
whenToUse: Executive sponsors need a shared definition of value
There are competing priorities across business lines
whenNotToUse: The program is purely technical remediation with a fixed scope and timeline

gotchas: Confusing project outputs with business outcomes
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Pick 3–5 outcomes (e.g., decommission by date, change lead time, incident rate, cost per integration).

complexity.rationale: Primarily a facilitation and framing exercise.
complexity.skillDemand: Product thinking; ability to translate strategy into metrics.
complexity.toolingDemand: Basic analytics and reporting pipelines for KPIs.

realWorldExample.approach: Created an outcome map tied to decommission waves and operational readiness.
realWorldExample.outcome: Better sequencing and fewer “busy work” initiatives.
